dao.name: QRY_SERV_TYPE_RF_USE_TYP
dao.statement: select code as value, code_nam as display from ais_external_dw where dw_nam = 'd_hfd_servtype_use_typ' and lang_cod = pg_ais.sf_lang_cod(pg_ais.sf_language(0)) and athena_id = trim(:athena_id) order by sort_cod

dao.name: QRY_GW_CUST_RF_AGENT_NO
dao.statement: select code agent_no, code_nam from ais_external_dw where dw_nam = 'd_gw_cust_rf_agent_no' and lang_cod = pg_ais.sf_lang_cod(pg_ais.sf_language(0)) and athena_id = ? order by sort_cod
